turns.content: give me a list of 10 whacky nicknames for my friend Amanda Van West in the theme of 1920s gangster names

1. "The Duchess of Dynamite"

3. "Miss Pistol Packin' Mandy"
4. "The Westside Whisperer"
5. "Amanda 'The Vixen' Van West"
6. "The Countess of Crime"
7. "Amanda 'The Hammer' Van West"
8. "The Queen of Capers"
9. "Amanda 'The Enforcer' Van West"
10. "The Black Widow of the West"

using hooch, speakeasy, and gin-runner as inspiration, come up with a gangster style nickname for Amanda Van West
